ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh even without necros I think  my necro and a 42 enchanter friend kept the isle basically cleared. Often times I ll go there and they ll will be one group
ygData.messageBody:
Heh even without necros I think my necro and a 42 enchanter friend kept the
isle basically cleared. Often times I'll go there and they'll will be one
group who keeps it cleared without necros. Just need to have the right group
for it. Besides which as I stated that place is camped like mad and they
recently lowered exp that you get from furies.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 1:00 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Wed, 26 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> Again why ? I don't care about exp anymore. FYI if it supposts 3 full
groups
>> of 50's on your server then they are doing something wrong. I can pull
and
>> solo 1 sea fury non stop. The most it supposts is a two groups if that.
The
>> loot sucks and guess what they are overcamped now to.
>
>It'll support 3 groups without necros. :) The loot does suck
>though. Even Gornit nearby drops better loot. We killed the
>boss there a couple times. Got about 2sp average if I recall.
>
>--
